text:
#COVID19 #Vaccine 💉: Act of Charity

Let’s be explicit w friends - we are getting vaccinated to protect society 👏 (Herd Immunity) 👏 not just ourselves. Draw on his/her sense of social justice & compassion. Our conversation is too focused on self.

#MedTwitter #meded #pandemic https://t.co/WWFjDmazl4
